mapper.select: SELECT h.emp_no empNo, h.start_date startDate, h.end_date endDate, h.type_name typeName, d.title title, d.content content FROM day_off_history h INNER JOIN draft_doc d ON d.drafter_emp_no = h.emp_no AND d.draft_doc_no = h.draft_doc_no WHERE h.emp_no = #{empNo} AND h.use_year = #{year} ORDER BY h.start_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM day_off_history WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND use_year = #{year}
